item.title: Discord Now Works More Seamlessly Across the iPhone, iPad, and Mac
item.description: The popular messaging app Discord has been updated with Handoff support, for an improved cross-platform experience across the iPhone, iPad, and Mac. The release notes for the update explain what this

item.title: Age Verification Is Sweeping Gaming. Is It Ready for the Age of AI Fakes?
item.description: Discord users are already using video game characters to bypass the UK’s age-check laws. AI deepfakes could make things even more complicated.

item.title: Anime Girl VTubers Are Selling Out Concerts, but Are They ‘Real?’ Depends on Who You Ask
item.description: Virtual anime streamers are selling out live venues, singing at pro sports games, and launching record labels, with fans showering them with presents and suspending disbelief in service of the bit.
